long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Walcu Connect allows to import OEM lead data into Walcu CRM. It connects to several OEM CRMs in multiple countries. 

It is as easy as login in to Walcu Connect with your Walcu CRM credentials and navigate to the OEM system and click on the extension button to import customer, vehicle, offers, and financial information.

Made with  by Walcu (www.walcu.com)
